variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject identifier [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Contact occasion [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA5A
variable.description: 5a. Did you wear monitor for the entire 24 hour period? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA5B
variable.description: 5b. Did you wear monitor for the entire 24 hour period? Was this because it fell off? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA5C
variable.description: 5c. Did you wear monitor for the entire 24 hour period? Was this because you were too uncomfortable? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA5D
variable.description: 5d. Did you wear monitor for the entire 24 hour period? Was this because you took it off to bathe or swim? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA5E
variable.description: 5e. Did you wear monitor for the entire 24 hour period? Was this because the monitor malfunctioned? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA5F
variable.description: 5f. Did you wear monitor for the entire 24 hour period? Was this because any other reasons? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA6
variable.description: 6. How comfortable was it to wear the monitor? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA7
variable.description: 7. Would you agree to repeat procedure in the future if asked to do so? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA8A
variable.description: 8a. What are the reasons why you are not interested in repeating this procedure? Was the monitor too noisy? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA8B
variable.description: 8b. What are the reasons why you are not interested in repeating this procedure? Did you sleep poorly because of the monitor? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA8C
variable.description: 8c. What are the reasons why you are not interested in repeating this procedure? Was the monitor painful? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA8D
variable.description: 8d. What are the reasons why you are not interested in repeating this procedure? Did the monitor cause any numbness, swelling, or bruising? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA8E
variable.description: 8e. What are the reasons why you are not interested in repeating this procedure? Because you could not discontinue your normal activities? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA8F
variable.description: 8f. What are the reasons why you are not interested in repeating this procedure? Because this procedure seemed unimportant? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA8G
variable.description: 8g. What are the reasons why you are not interested in repeating this procedure? Are there any other reason? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA11A
variable.description: 11a. Did you removal of monitor during the 24 hour period? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA11D
variable.description: 11d. Did you reapply monitor? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA15
variable.description: 15. Did monitor meet quality control? [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA2
variable.description: 2. Time monitor ended (hh:mm) 24 hour clock [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA9
variable.description: 9. Time did you get up (hh:mm) 24 hour clock [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA10
variable.description: 10. Time did you go to sleep (hh:mm) 24 hour clock [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA11B
variable.description: 11b. Time monitor removed (hh:mm) 24 hour clock [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: ABPA11E
variable.description: 11e. What time monitor reapplied (hh:mm) 24 hour clock [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: BTD01IC
variable.description: Blood samples tested for diseases [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]

variable.name: DTD01IC
variable.description: Data tested for diseases [Visit 1] [Post ABPM Form, Version A]
